data.message: EMINEM IM NOT YOUR BIGGEST FAN BUT NO LIE I AM ONE OF YOUR BIGGEST FAN I HAVE ALL YOUR ALBUMS KNOW OR HEARD ALL YOUR SONGS HAVE 15 OF YOUR SHIRTS 2 POSTERS GETTING UR CALENDER AND 2 SHIRTS OF SHADY RECORDS A HAT OF SHADY RECORDS AND A JACKET OF SHADY RECORDS PPL CALL ME STAN EMINEM AND SLIM SHADYY EVEN MY TEACHERS COME DO A CONCERT IN LA BRO KEEP DOING WHAT YOU DOIN ALRIGHT YOUR THE BEST ALSO HAVE 2 BAD MEETS EVIL SHIRTS HAVE YOUR BEENIE TOO HAVE YOUR RECOVERY JACKET TOO HAVE 2 SLOUGHTER HOUSE ALBUMS AND RADIO ACTIVE BY YELAWOLF I MIGHT GET YOUR DETROIT HAT ON YOUR STORE HAVE 2 COPIES OF 8 MILE I CANT GO A DAY WITHOUT LISTENIN TO YOU I EVEN DID A POEM ABOUT H0W GREAT YOU R AT SCHOOL CAUSE THAT WAS OUR PROJECT AND DID UR POEM PRETTY EYES PPL SAY U WROTE IT I WANNA BE JUST LIKE YOU WHEN I GROW UP AND ALSO ASK KENDRICK LAMAR ABOUT HIS COUSIN ZERICK P I KNOW ZERRICK HES MY FRIEND ZERICKS HIS COUSIN I GOT RECOURSES HAHA HOPE YOU GET TO READ THIS -Victor D. Sanchez in C.A AKA Victor MistaShady Sanchez  IF YOU HAVE A ACOUNT ADD ME BRO
